settings.title: Features
settings.content:
Dual-Power Spin Mopping
Two mopping pads with 10N force to the floor cling to the ground and spin 180 times per minute to loosen and wipe off the most annoying stains with ease.

Washing Machine for Your Mops

The mops are always clean to perform. Two 3.5L water tanks store clean and wastewater separately to avoid cross-contamination. yeedi even dries the washed mops to avoid odor generation when clean completes.

3000Pa Suction Power

Boast up to 3000Pa strong suction power to suck up dirt hidden deep in the crevices. A 750ml capacious swapping dustbin bigger than that of most robot vacuums on the market stores more dust for less emptying.

Carpet Caring

With an ultrasonic carpet sensor, yeedi recognizes your carpet and cleans it cleverly. In mopping mode, it steers away to avoid wetting it, while in vacuuming mode, it increases the suction to MAX for deep carpet cleaning.

180mins Runtime & Auto Recharge

The built-in 5200mAh battery fuels up 180mins of runtime on a single charge.  Automatically recharges and resumes cleaning.

App & Voice Control

yeedi app lets you set cleaning sequence, schedule cleaning, set up a no-go zone, and more anywhere, anytime, and integration with Alexa and Google Home allows you to clean with your voice.

settings.title: Specs
settings.content:
Model yeedi mop station pro/ yeedi k850+

Navigation Visual SLAM

Suction Power 600/1500/3000 Pa

Water Tank Capacity 240 ml

Water Flow Levels 3

Dustbin Capacity 450 ml

Dust Bag Capacity 2.5 L

Dimensions 350 x 350 x 77 mm (Robot)

300 x 420 x 430 mm (Self-Empty Station)

Battery Capacity 5200 mAh

Working Time 200 mins

Charging Time 6 Hours

Carpet Detection Yes

Auto-Boost Suction Yes

Obstacle Crossing Ability 9 mm

Control yeedi App/Alexa

Mop Like a Pro
settings.subheading: Some robot mop sprays water onto the floor and drags a mopping pad around leaving wet trucks all over the place. But yeedi’s two mopping pads are pressed tightly against the floor by a 10N force and they spin 180r/min to loosen and wipe off stubborn stains.

settings.title: Built-in “Washing Machine” for Your Mops
settings.subheading: The self-cleaning system with 3.5L separate water tanks scrubs and rinses the mopping pads automatically and dries them when cleaning completes to keep them clean and fresh.

settings.title: Generous Water Supply
settings.content: 3.5L*2 water tanks store clean and wastewater separately to keep your mopping pads clean and moist. Cover more space with less water replenishing.
settings.content_mb: 3.5L*2 water tanks store clean and wastewater separately to keep your mopping pads clean and moist. Cover more space with less water

settings.title: You Don’t Need a Team to Clean
settings.content: No need to buy another robot vacuum. yeedi vacuums and mops simultaneously with 3000Pa strong suction. A 750ml swapping dustbin stores more for less emptying.
settings.content_mobile: 3000pa suction is powerful enough to pick up any dirt and a 750ml swapping dustbin stores more for less emptying.

settings.title: Spare No Dirt
settings.title_mb: Steer away from carpet in mopping mode

settings.title: Wet No Carpet
settings.title_mb: Automatically increase suction power in vacuuming mode

settings.bottomtitle: Carpet detection sensor intelligently identifies your carpet. It'll steer away from it in mopping mode and automatically increase suction power in vacuuming mode to get the best clean.
settings.subtitle_mb: Carpet detection sensor intelligently identifies your carpet.

settings.title: Clean in Neat Rows No Spots Missed
settings.content: Learn your home layout and plan neat cleaning paths without missing any spots thanks to the Visual SLAM technology and floor tracking sensor.
settings.content_mobile: Learn your home layout and plan neat cleaning paths without missing any spots thanks to the Visual SLAM technology and floor tracking sensor.

settings.title: Clean in a New Way
settings.content:
The intuitive yeedi app lets you schedule cleaning, set up
no-go zones, spot clean an area, and more even when you
are not around. Compatible with Alexa and Google Home
for voice control.
